rows.label: tlk190002_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Rex, my boy.
Feel free to take your time.

rows.label: tlk190002_01_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm plenty tired, so I'll just snooze here
for a spell.

rows.label: tlk190002_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Thanks, Gramps.
Take it easy, then!

rows.label: tlk190002_01_msg0004
rows.name:
And just in case you were wondering...
I don't need any souvenirs, so don't go
out of your way for my benefit.

rows.label: tlk190002_01_msg0006
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]That definitely means he
wants something. But what...?
